00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 import pygame
00004 from pygame.locals import *
00005 import time
00006 import os
00007 
00008 path = os.getcwd()
00009 pygame.init()
00010 
00011 size = width, height = 640, 480
00012 screen = pygame.display.set_mode(size)
00013 
00014 # Load background
00015 board = pygame.image.load(path+'/app/frogger/background.png').convert()
00016 
00017 # Load frog
00018 frog = pygame.image.load(path+'/app/frogger/frog.tga').convert()
00019 base_rect = frog.get_rect()
00020 frog_rect = base_rect.move(0,0)
00021 
00022 running = True
00023 while running:
00024     # Event handling
00025     for event in pygame.event.get():
00026         if event.type == QUIT:
00027             running = False
00028         elif event.type == KEYDOWN:
00029             if event.key == K_ESCAPE:
00030                 running = False
00031 
00032             if event.key == K_UP:
00033                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, -40)
00034             elif event.key == K_DOWN:
00035                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, 40)
00036             elif event.key == K_LEFT:
00037                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(-40, 0)
00038             elif event.key == K_RIGHT:
00039                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(40, 0)
00040                 
00041 
00042     screen.blit(board, board.get_rect())
00043     screen.blit(frog, frog_rect)
00044     pygame.display.flip()
00045 
00046 
00047 pygame.quit()
